xmlquery.searchDeviceTrx: Select *, b.nmDeviceType as nmDeviceType, c.nmSite as nmSite from smiot_device_trx a inner join smiot_device_type b inner join smhris_site c on a.idDeviceType = b.idDeviceType and a.idSite = c.idSite order by a.updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceTrxByIdSite: Select *, b.nmDeviceType as nmDeviceType, c.nmSite as nmSite from smiot_device_trx a inner join smiot_device_type b inner join smhris_site c on a.idDeviceType = b.idDeviceType and a.idSite = c.idSite where idSite = ? order by a.updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceTrxByAnyLike: Select *, b.nmDeviceType as nmDeviceType from smiot_device_trx a inner join smiot_device_type b inner join smhris_site c on a.idDeviceType = b.idDeviceType and a.idSite = c.idSite where a.idDevice like ? or a.idDeviceType like ? or a.idSite like ?
